name: Advanced Flourishes
description: Learn intricate staff movements that enhance style and fluidity.

cards.title: Neck Wrap
cards.description: A seamless transition where the staff wraps around the neck before being caught.
bulletpoints: Start with a slow spin and guide the staff behind your head
Tuck your chin slightly to allow the wrap
Catch the staff smoothly without disrupting its motion

cards.title: Aerial Release
cards.description: A dynamic trick where the staff is released mid-air and caught with precision.
bulletpoints: Use controlled force to flick the staff upwards
Keep your eyes on the staff at all times
Time your catch to continue the movement fluidly
